name: TripIt
description: TripIt is an intelligent travel organizer that helps travelers manage their plans so that their trips go more smoothly. Travelers simply forward their purchase confirmation emails to TripIt and TripIt automatically creates master itineraries with travel plans and other critical information. With TripIt, itu2019s easy for travelers to print or access their trip plans from anywhereu2013and to share itineraries and travel calendars with friends in their TripIt network.
